did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle:
Guide to the Equine veterinary diagnosis and treatment notebook,

persname.normal: [give the MARC presentation of creator here, i.e., surname first; include dates]

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
did.abstract: One bound notebook of veterinary diagnoses and treatments for horses compiled by Benjamin F. Price in 1898.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: There is no information currently available about Benjamin F. Price.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: One bound notebook of veterinary diagnoses and treatments for horses compiled by Benjamin F. Price in 1898.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: The binding is extremely fragile. Photocopying may be prohibited.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Price, Benjamin F. Equine Veterinary Diagnosis and Treatment Notebook, #6593. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

custodhist.head: HISTORY OF OWNERSHIP
custodhist.p: Donated to the Flower-Sprecher Veterinary Library by Dr. Jenny Callis, DVM, in 1989.

acqinfo.head: PROVENANCE
acqinfo.p: Transfered from the Flower-Sprecher Veterinary Library in 2004
